snippet: The United States’ share of the total travel market is down, to 11.2 percent in 2010 from 17.3 percent in 2000, and a marketing group is pushing to change that.
abstract: Marketing group Brand USA will launch campaign to encourage foreign tourists to visit the United States; US share of the total travel market is down to 11.2 percent in 2010 from 17.3 percent in 2000.
lead_paragraph: The United States’ share of the total travel market is down, to 11.2 percent in 2010 from 17.3 percent in 2000, and a marketing group is pushing to change that.

headline.seo: With Brand USA, U.S. in Big Drive to Attract Foreign Tourists
